room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by Escape Game Erie in Erie
review: This was a blast! We did the Da Vinci themed escape room as a date night, and it was so much more fun than a run of the mill night out! It was great with just the pair of us, but I imagine it might be easier with a slightly larger group.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by Escape Game Erie in Erie
review: We were looking for something to do and decided to give this a try. We saved DaVinci's paintings with 15 seconds left and had a really great time! It was quite a challenge. And thanks to our host Tera for the guidance when bumbling around with the clues. We can't wait to try out the other rooms!
